name: Taco Polenta Fries
preparation: In a Multipurpose Steamer, combine water, cornmeal, and Seasoning.
Cover and microwave on high for 8–10 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes in the fridge.
Turn polenta out onto a cutting board. Cut into about 30 French fry-shaped pieces. Place on a crisper and lightly brush with oil. Bake 10 minutes, or until crispy.
Serve with Creamy Ranch Dip for dunking.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavour with medium heat.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
